name: Farmando
description:
This game was an entry for the LowrezJam2022 so it's constraint is that it has to show only 64 x 64 pixels on screen.

Help Farmando defend his crops from waves of mischievous pests! 

Be wary of not losing all your life or all crops!

You'll have to choose if you want to grow more crops or shoot them against your enemies!

4 types of crops each with different effects!

4 types of enemies which pose different challenges!

Controls:

-LMB to shoot crops

-RMB to plant crops

-Scroll mouse wheel to change crops

-WASD to move

-ESC to pause

Authors:

Music & Sound effects by zenkusa: https://soundcloud.com/zenkusa

Iacopo Regoli | Game design, game programming

Michele Leva | Game design, game programming

Alessandro Mazza | Game programming

With the contribution of:

Hilary Palazzolo, for the high res cover image | Instagram
